mean_cn: n. 高潮，最令人兴奋（或感兴趣）的部分
mean_en: the most exciting or important event or point in time; the most exciting part of a play, piece of music, etc. that usually happens near the end; the highest point of sexual pleasure
sentence: Everyone cried at the movie’s touching climax.
sentence_trans: 电影的高潮部分太感人了，大家都哭了。
word_etyma: cli倾斜+max最大 → 斜坡的最高处 → 高潮
